title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competency: Strengthening Professional Ethics Through Moral Reflection: Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of ethics education at the secondary level and professional practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze moral issues arising in professional settings and derive solutions.
Learners can explain the ethical decision-making process in social contexts through case studies
Learners can develop action plans reflecting the linkage between professional ethics and social values through problem-based learning activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
